code: import{CHANGE_SEARCH_FIELD}from'./constants.js';var initialState={searchField:''};export var searchRobots=function searchRobots(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var action=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:{};switch(action.type){case CHANGE_SEARCH_FIELD:return Object.assign({},state,{searchField:action.payload});default:return state;}};
